body_html:
I finally solved this by installing patch:

sudo yum install patch

Thanks for your advice, have you met this error /home/adamzhangchao/bin/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/kafka/BUILD:36:1: no such package '@kafka//': Traceback (most recent call last): ?

body:
> I finally solved this by installing `patch`:
> 
> ```
> sudo yum install patch
> ```

Thanks for your advice,  have you met  this error `/home/adamzhangchao/bin/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/kafka/BUILD:36:1: no such package '@kafka//': Traceback (most recent call last): ` ?
